alert.note: Alert for Catawba; Iredell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Catawba and southern Iredell Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Statesville, or near Catawba, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Statesville, Troutman, Claremont, Catawba, Lake Norman, Lookout Shoals Lake, Lake Norman State Park, Sherrills Ford, Terrell and Doolie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
